articles.content: IMAGE: Captain Sunil Chhetri is lifted in the air by team-mates after India won the SAFF Championship on Tuesday. Chhetri scored 6 goals in the tournament. Photograph: Kind courtesy Indian Football/T… [+2874 chars]

articles.author: The Bridge Desk
articles.title: Rujuta Khade breaks 20-year-old swimming national record - The Bridge
articles.description: Indian swimming's power couple, Rujuta and Virdhawal Khade, make it a nationals to remember.
articles.content:
Rujuta Khade obliterated a 20-year-old national record at the swimming nationals in Hyderabad on Tuesday.
Rujuta clocked 26.47s to win the gold in the 50m women's freestyle event, in the process sha… [+991 chars]

articles.title: Neeraj Chopra's relentless quest for perfection - Mint Lounge
articles.description: Olympics hero Neeraj Chopra may have made winning a habit, but the world number 1 is quietly determined to win gold at the World Championships
articles.content: Achha, mota lag raha tha main?asked Neeraj Chopra with a chuckle as talked about his first-place finish at the Lausanne Diamond League during a virtual meet with Indian reporters. Maybe I have. I mus… [+6626 chars]
